New Records: Darius Garland scored 39 points, matching his career high, and the Cavaliers improved to 8-0 with the win
Key Match Events: Garland made two key free throws in the final minutes to secure the win
The Cavaliers' defense held the Bucks to 114 points despite their absence of Giannis Antetokounmpo
Pre-Game Insights: The Cavaliers were expected to face a tough challenge without their star player, but their depth and strategy shined
The Bucks struggled offensively without Giannis, leading to their defeat
Post-Match Reflections: Darius Garland expressed excitement about the team's effort and the win
Head coach Drew Valentine highlighted the win as a testament to the team's resilience
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was a high-scoring affair with both teams showing offensive prowess despite the absence of a key player
The win marked the Cavaliers' eighth consecutive victory
